price: Never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers[36]. Allah is All-Mighty, Capable of Retribution.
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ
footnotes: [36] i.e., that they would be given victory both in this life and in the Hereafter.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
